post.body: I've roped Son1 into doing the dishes ... he needs money =)
he =) Live tweeting awesome stuff like tweddings & births - I can only offer my armpits, and that's more than enough about 'em
LOL! Well, I'm not getting married or having any (more) babies, so it's about the best I can do =)
You don't want to see my armpit?! Mmk then ...
Although I have REALLY good photo of my armpit (decorating the tree) that I'll stick on my blog later hehehe =)
Yip - officially closed till 12 Jan YAY! And umm, yer, you could be waiting a while for that pic ... I'm far too camera shy =)
Good plan ... think I'll do the same. Housework (blegh!) now and some shopping (double blegh!!) later ...
I've got a Samsung 40â€³ LA40A330 HD Ready TV - LOVE IT! http://tinyurl.com/a726u9
And no words will make you feel better. That's intensely traumatic and heartbreaking. Love and hugs xxx
I haven't started either!! I may leave it to tomorrow though, possibly quieter?
@sznq I really needed it sjoe! I feel almost human again =) Earplugs FTW!
wrapping up lunch now. It's been cool ... good company, good food ... going home to veg =)
No tweets? Never!!! =) Be back soon
omw, I'm so sorry =(
try find one run by a woman and give her a freebie =)
you can take some samples to local pharmacies and ask them to stock for you, for a cut of sales.
good morning! I'm good today =) Feeling inspired after the birth of www.bodythrills.co.za !!
bodythrills.co.za ... Short 'n sweet. Pity you can't snap up some other 'thrills' domains for your new empire =)
Would love to be your guinea pig =)
Don't know. Which ever one can deliver most promptly. Poor delivery times will just piss people off.
bubble wrap, boxes, phone for quotes on weight and distance and ETA's. Send one out, see what happens.
postage only *seems* like a mare now 'cos you haven't researched and tested. Once you find the right solution, you'll be rocking!
don't dilute your brand.
your own. Keep it personal.
OMG! What an insane invitation wow!! Thank you! That would be awesome but I have kiddies and animals. And some work stuffs to do.
Exciting eh? This is so cool =)
ask @vincenthofmann about what he's done on Moral Fibre.
Stunning =) I'm envious ... I also want to hear the sea when I wake up! One day *sigh*
@exmi AYE!
you have a huge fan base on you site. Customers ripe for the picking. Start there.
You don't know that till you get out and sell it! Give the over priced Body Shop a run for their money. I dare you =)
Oyness! That really does suck. But you have many talents, no doubt you can monetize one or 2 =)
That sounds completely divine! Where are you holidaying?
I'm procrastinating ... *sigh* ... domestic chores await ... I really miss my cleaning lady!
Shot Smith!
I have a choice: housework or shopping today? I could do without either but ...
Good morning!! Damn, I slept well =)
Horizontal until further notice.
Christmas lunching at Greens in Gardens =)
And ... we're off! The Forge is now officially CLOSED till 12 Jan w00t!
